Meet the team
Ajey Gore Ajey Gore is a successful technologist and passionate leader. His sixteen year career spans core technology R&D, technology consulting and senior management roles.
He is now focussed on his new venture, CodeIgnition, one of India's top DevOps, automation, networking and cloud services consulting firms.
Ajey is an reputed speaker and a board member of the Innovation and Technology Trust, a non-profit that supports Ruby, Go Language and DevOps conferences in India. He is also a core team member of RubyConf India, India's largest Ruby and Rails event and has been instrumental in making it a huge success over the five years it has been in existence.
